description: This header file declares functions for client-side inter-process communication (IPC) in a system, including checking service availability, waiting for services, sending requests with or without timeouts, and shutting down the IPC sender.

methods.name: isServiceAvailable
methods.description: Checks if a local service is available by port number.

methods.name: waitForServiceAvailable
methods.description: Waits for a local service to become available within a specified timeout.

methods.name: sendServiceRequest
methods.description: Sends an IPC request to a specified service and receives a response.

methods.name: sendServiceRequestTimeout
methods.description: Sends an IPC request with a specified timeout for the response.

methods.name: ipcSenderShutdown
methods.description: Shuts down the IPC sender, signaling pending requests to terminate.
